name: Patrick Clarence
description: I am a very outgoing and easygoing person. kind of shy at first when meeting with someone but get along as time goes by. I am a very energetic and hardworking man. I love my job and do it with passion, dedication and commitment. I am a caring, genuine and fun-loving person who enjoys life. I am very honest and loyal. I am a very down to earth, loving and compassionate person. I have a kind and big heart. I love to laugh and make others laugh. I am loving, caring, kind, honest, faithful, truthful, affectionate, passionate, optimistic, easygoing, outgoing, good sense of humor and understanding. During my spare time I like to hang out with friends, listen to music, BBQ, gardening, watch TV and do some outdoor things. I am romantic but at the same time I try to be objective evaluating the world surrounding me. I do like admiring the seascape which make you feel like leaving for a distant journey, learning something new you have never known before. I like having fun, laughing and making people laugh as well. I enjoy going on walks, communicating, cuddling with that special person, spoiling her and treating her like a woman should be treated and having the utmost respect for her. I love candles as I am a very romantic person, holding her while watching a movie. I love the outdoors I am always doing something interesting. I love to go out dancing and just being with my woman. I am not a racist. all people are equal no matter your color or nationality, we are all human.
